description: Simon Balley is both writer and creator of beautifully crafted unusual gift books. Projects in his retinue include eight Gig Journals for the musically challenged, Signs, a desk top non-verbal communication tool for the work place. He is currently working on an origami title full of horror. He lives in Sussex, UK.
